quote: Power comes in response to a need, not a desire.
author: Goku

quote: A lesson you learned from a mistake is a lesson well learned.
author: Zoro

quote: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
author: Itachi

quote: If I don’t wield the sword, I can’t protect you. If I keep wielding the sword, I can’t embrace you.
Fear is not evil. It tells you what your weakness is.
author: Gildarts
